page.title: 09Family LIfe - Weekends.
page.content: On Friday evenings,we've come home from school, Sue our Nanny has left for the weekend,and Mum and Dad have come home from their work,my sister is watching television. We stay up a bit later than usual.In the morning we lay-in and have coffee in bed,then we get up and go downstairs to breakfast.Later I go up to the shop,and if it is nice weather I get some food for a picnic.We all help to do the chores,then we go out for a drive somewhere, then a walk.After lunch we go home.Later I go horse riding and Mum goes to the shops.When we come back we have tea. On Sundays we get up early,have a fried breakfast and go to church. After we come back I play with my friend.
